{{ja-kanjitab|い|じゃ|k2=ざ|な|み|yomi=o}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|伊弉冉}}; {{ja-l|伊弉弥}}
* {{ja-l|伊耶那美}}

===Etymology===
Appears to be of identical derivation as {{ja-l|伊邪那岐||Izanagi}}, only replacing the last syllable {{m|ja|き|tr=ki||male|pos=common element in Japanese male given names}} with {{m|ja|み|tr=mi||female|pos=common element in Japanese female given names}}. See the {{ja-l|伊邪那岐}} entry for further details.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|イザナミ|y=o}}

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|いざなみ|イザナミ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=いさなみ'|Japanese mythology|Shinto}}: [[Izanami]], the [[Japanese]] [[creator]] [[goddess]], [[wife]] of [[Izanagi]], and [[mother]] of [[Kagutsuchi]]
